channel.title: Comments on: A personal response to the life of Nelson Mandela, from someone who met him
channel.description: Supporting children's language, communication and learning

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: Hi Tim I have the impression that schoolchildren will be studying the life and achievements of Nelson Mandela for centuries to come. It seems to me that people are crying out for political leaders with his integrity. They must exist, and we should start voting for them! Very best wishes, and all the best for Christmas, new year and for an exciting 2014. I have posts lined up featuring Jethro Tull, Flight of the Conchords, Modern Family and assorted 70s bands like Focus (the Dutch bands with the yodelling elvin folk speaking in tongues) and The Doors. Michael
item.content:encoded:
Hi Tim
I have the impression that schoolchildren will be studying the life and achievements of Nelson Mandela for centuries to come.
It seems to me that people are crying out for political leaders with his integrity. They must exist, and we should start voting for them!
Very best wishes, and all the best for Christmas, new year and for an exciting 2014.
I have posts lined up featuring Jethro Tull, Flight of the Conchords, Modern Family and assorted 70s bands like Focus (the Dutch bands with the yodelling elvin folk speaking in tongues) and The Doors.
Michael

item.title: By: Tim Dunkerley
item.dc:creator: Tim Dunkerley
item.description: Very lovely Judith. Heartfelt and touching TDx
item.content:encoded:
Very lovely Judith. Heartfelt and touching
TDx

item.title: By: Carolyn Purser
item.dc:creator: Carolyn Purser
item.description: Oh my oh my! Thank you Judith for this wonderful tribute, it has touched my heart
item.content:encoded: Oh my oh my! Thank you Judith for this wonderful tribute, it has touched my heart
